title: Malleus maleficarum, translated with an introduction, bibliography and notes by the Rev. Montague Summers.
author: Institoris, Heinrich, 1430-1505.

title: The discovery of witches; a study of Master Matthew Hopkins, commonly call'd Witch finder generall, by the Rev. Montague Summers, together with a reprint of The discovery of witches from the rare original of 1647.
author: Summers, Montague, 1880-1948.
